items.sentence: Let me give you something to remember me by.
I think that Tom was about ready to do that.
Tom became a French teacher three years ago.
I want the recipe for this. It\'s delicious.
Could you give us just a few minutes longer?
Could you please show me your boarding pass?
I\'m going to give you just one more chance.
How long does Tom expect us to wait for him?
Don\'t argue with a woman when she\'s tired.
Tom is just a farm boy living in a big city.
Tom is just not the person I thought he was.
Tom is likely to be chosen for the position.
Tom is likely to be tired when he gets home.
Tom is looking forward to seeing Mary again.
Your blood pressure may go up in the winter.
Suppose Tom wasn\'t really going to do that.
Tom found out that Mary was a married woman.
Tom gave Mary a hug and a kiss on the cheek.
I love you and think about you all the time.
I think you could\'ve done this by yourself.
